description:
A free app & debit card that makes saving money as easy as spending it.

Are you paying off debts, saving for a goal, or trying to be more aware of your spending? The free Moven app and debit card will help you be more mindful with your money when it matters most — right before you spend it. With Moven’s daily feedback and instant receipts you can improve your financial health with every spending decision.

How Does it Work?

Download the free Moven app and sign up for your free, FDIC insured account. We at Moven will mail you a debit card and wireless sticker that allows you to pay with your card or phone wherever MasterCard™ or MasterCard PayPass™ is accepted.

Link your existing bank account to Moven so you can transfer money to your Moven card and start using it. Whether it’s groceries, dining out, shopping, or entertainment, Moven automatically analyzes your spending and gives you instant feedback.

Check your real-time Spending Meter™ to know if you're spending faster or slower than usual, so you can make informed decisions before you make a purchase. It’s as easy as “staying in the green!”

Get an Instant Receipt with every purchase that tracks your spending on similar items, so you can easily stay on top of your spending patterns. Because when you spend mindfully, saving money just happens!

Send money to Facebook friends or anyone via email or text at no cost. Pay back a friend, split the check, or just send someone $20 when you forgot to get them a present!

Forget about fees. Access your money at over 42,000 ATMs with no surcharges. And Moven has absolutely no monthly fees or overdraft charges!

At Moven, our mission is to put people back in control of their money and to make it easier to lead a financially healthy lifestyle. In fact, we’ve taken an oath to do just that!

So download Moven today and have fun with your money while getting the most out of it!

Disclosures
The Moven debit card is issued by CBW Bank, member FDIC, so your money is safely held in a federally-insured account.
releaseNotes:
Ready to get Moven?
You are one step closer to the world’s first downloadable mobile debit account. In this update, we've made it even easier to get Moven. Install the app, take the tour, and sign up in no time flat.
 
Already spending and saving on the move with Moven?
We've improved your login page and squashed bugs in this update. Thanks for your support!
